preconditions.precondition: The Chef selects the ingredient to update.

mainSequence.step: UI layer requests current expiry date from backend server.
Backend server queries ingredient expiry date from database.
Backend server shows the current expiry date to UI layer.
UI layer submits the updated expiry date to backend server.
Backend server updates the expiry date in the database.
Database confirms the update to backend server.
Backend server confirms the successful update to UI layer.
UI layer displays the update confirmation to the Chef.
